attributes.action: force all land and mobile telephone providers to have incoming call-barring services similar to BT's "choose to refuse" and to ban businesses from using "withheld" or "unknown" numbers, so that a private person can always identify an incoming call from a business.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people are constantly harassed on their land or mobile telephones from nuisance calls, tele-sales, silent calls, automated marketing systems etc. 

BT provide a "choose to refuse" service, that whilst limited, is a useful way to bar incoming calls from certain known numbers.

All service providers should be forced to offer a similar service to allow people to bar incoming calls from known numbers, plus the ability to bar all calls from "withheld" or "unknown" numbers.

Furthermore, no business should be allowed to make calls where their number is hidden to the recipient. It should be possible for anyone to identify any incoming call from a business (though number withholding should continue to be allowed for private individuals privacy)
